newsitem.title: USA: Lincare Holdings in $1 mln settlement.
newsitem.headline: Lincare Holdings in $1 mln settlement.

text.p: Lincare Holdings Inc said on Friday that it resolved with the United States Attorney for the Middle District of Florida an investigation that had been pending since 1991.
Lincare said it, without admitting any wrongdoing or liability, has agreed to pay $1 million to the United States Government.
The United States Attorney had been investigating certain services provided by the company to a pharmacy that supplied medications to home respiratory patients, a statement from Lincare said.
Under its contracts with the pharmacy, Lincare was responsible for providing various marketing, field administration and patient services to the pharmacy.
